Titles Most PL title wins 13 - Manchester United

(1992/93, 1993/94, 1995/96, 1996/97, 1998/99, 1999/00, 2000/01, 2002/03, 2006/07, 2007/08, 2008/09, 2010/11 & 2012/13) Most consecutive PL title wins 4 - Manchester City (2020/21-2023/24) Biggest PL title-winning margin 19 points - Manchester City

(2017/18) Smallest PL title-winning margin 0 points, +8 goal difference - Manchester City (2011/12)

*Nottingham Forest deducted four points following a breach of the Premier Leagueâ€™s Profitability and Sustainability Rules. Fewest points required to avoid relegation (excluding goal difference) 27 - 2023/24

Attendance Highest PL single match attendance 83,222 - Wembley Stadium, Tottenham Hotspur v Arsenal (10 February 2018) Highest PL season average attendance 75,821 - Old Trafford, Manchester United (2006/07) Lowest PL single match attendance 3,039 - Selhurst Park, Wimbledon v Everton (26 January 1993) Lowest PL season average attendance 8,353 - Selhurst Park, Wimbledon (1992/93)
